scenario_text.value: *pant* *pant* Man, that was a close one!

Those jerks! Going after my insecurities!
That Master is so going to pay for this.

Yeah, let’s go teach him a lesson! And
Minoru, one more thing.
As far as I’m concerned, you’re my hero.

Heheh, here’s to an ongoing beautiful
friendship, Takuma!
